strings.Value: [Do not interfere]
"Regongar, think. You're upsetting her. Is that any way to treat someone you love?"
"Octavia, you're wrong. Everything Regongar does, he's doing it for you with all his heart. Why not thank him for a change?"
"I'm looking at you and wondering... How did you ever survive Numeria if you treat each other like this?"

"There's this cantankerous old woman in the capital — I can't stand her! She wanders around everywhere with a huge shaggy dog that always barks or even bites! And the owner just doesn't care — she just says that her monster is playing!"
{n}Regongar smiles a broad smile.{/n} "Ha ha, you've complained about her already! You can forget about it — she won't bother anyone again."
"What? Why?"
"I torched the hairy beast. It's just a pile of ashes now. Then I made the hag lick the ashes from the paving stones. She enjoyed scaring strangers — so I gave her a little scare of her own, ha ha!"
"Reg! What the... Why? What have you done!?"

{n}The smile leaves the half-orc's face.{/n} "What? I didn't even touch her, just the monster... You said yourself how tired you are of the old hag! So I thought I'd make you happy! {Name}, come on, tell her."

"Happy? Are you serious? Regongar, you're just... Ugh, I'm so furious!" {n}The half-elf clenches her fists.{/n} "Did I ask you to do it? Or maybe on the contrary — I asked you a hundred times NOT to do things like that?! Why, why don't you ever listen? You always do the craziest thing a demon would think of, and then say you did it for me!"

"But it really was for you! What's so wrong about it? You know, I love you and I'm ready to do anything for you! I'll move mountains! I'll rip out anyone's throat! And all I get in return is a scolding! I'll do anything for you — and you don't even care! You're always mad at me!"

"What, am I supposed to thank you? For random acts of throat-ripping? For doing things I've asked you not to do? If you're doing everything for me, then maybe for once you strain your ears and listen to what I have to say?"
"What, am I not listening? You said the hag made you angry — so I handled the hag! And you're mad at me again! What am I supposed to do to make you happy? Bite my own head off?"
"Reg... Shut up, just shut up. Another word, and I'll say something I'll regret later!" {n}The half-elf turns away.{/n}
{n}The half-orc looks at the back of her head resentfully, biting his lip.{/n}

"Are you on his side? Burning a dog alive — you think that's normal? He keeps attacking everyone and expects me to be happy about it. Even though I've told him a hundred times not to do it! Would you like this? I don't!"
"You never like anything. Don't kill this one, don't say that... Do you like me at all? Do you even still love me?"

"Are you on her side? What did I do? So I scared a hag so she'd stop bullying strangers! Some other time I chased away a creep who was messing with her. And I got her a cape — a nice warm one! And she still wasn't happy!"

"Reg, he wasn't messing with me! If he was, I would have handled him myself! The poor fellow was just asking me the way! And you didn't 'chase him away', you stabbed him with a knife! And for the cape you slaughtered an innocent traveler and two of her companions! After I specifically asked you not to touch them!"

"If they'd given me the cape willingly, I wouldn't have touched anyone... The cape was perfect, just right for you! I almost lost an eye getting it, and got an arrow in the side — and for what? You didn't even put it on! I didn't say anything back then, but its... It's like spitting in my face! Why do you keep doing this to me, huh? Do you even still love me?"
{n}The couple stops yelling, embarrassed.{/n}

"Reg, I'm sorry. I love you very much. And I'm very grateful for everything you've done for me. If it wasn't for you, I wouldn't have survived, it's true. It's just... You know, I don't like excessive violence. Please, for me — be just a tiny bit less bloodthirsty."

"I'm sorry too. You know, I am what I am, it's hard for me to be someone else. But I'll try, I will. Just don't forget, I'm doing it for you. Even if it's something stupid or gross or upset you... I don't mean it to. I love you. Without you I have no reason to live."
{n}Octavia and Regongar embrace.{/n}
